overview: When seemingly happy, travel-infatuated CJ Twomey violently ended his own life at age 20, his family was plunged into unrelenting grief and guilt. In a moment of desperate inspiration, his mother Hallie put out an open call on Facebook, looking only for a handful of travelers who might help fulfill her sonâ€™s wish to see the world by scattering some of his ashes in a place of beauty or special meaning.
tagline: The loss of one becomes the journey of many
title: Scattering CJ
